title: Banners (decorative)
summaries: Banners are decorative furniture items that can be placed on the underside of blocks. Many are found naturally-placed in various biomes. There are also four crafted banners (Red, Green, Blue, and Yellow). Banners can be hung off of blocks and off of platforms which are in (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) any position / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) their bottom position (after being struck three times with a hammer).

Faction flags are banners found in the <linked>Dungeon</linked>. In post-<linked>Plantera</linked> worlds, the faction flags found hanging in a particular Dungeon area correspond to the <linked>background wall</linked> type (brick, slab, or tile), both of which signify the types of enemies that will spawn there. See <linked>Hardmode Dungeon</linked> for more info.

There are a total of 23 decorative banners: 4 crafted, 6 faction flags, 3 <linked>Floating Island</linked>, 6 <linked>Underworld</linked>, 3 <linked>Pyramid</linked>, and 1 dropped from the <linked>Dark Mage</linked> during the <linked>Old One's Army</linked> event.
